name: CAYNE
description: Hadley wakes in a facility. She is 9 months pregnant. They want her baby... CAYNE is the free, isometric horror game from the creators of STASIS.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required) Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 240 GT or Radeon HD 6570 â€“ 1024 MB (1 gig) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 6 GB available space Additional Notes: Integrated Video card not recommended.
